elements.innerHtml:
HI, I'm HYUKJU-KWON

I majored in architecture from the age of 17, gained experience in practical work in the middle of the year when I turned 19, and a year later, I entered the indoor architecture department of Inha Technical University to upgrade my skills. Now I'm fluent in both practice and theory.

DESIGN PROCESS

A DESIGN THAT CAPTURES THE YEARS

Using baedari neglected idle site, the complex cultural center was designed to remember the pain of the long-term development and disconnected pear bridge, revitalize the forgotten history and used bookstore streets, and provide local residents and visitors with various things to see and enjoy.
~ Preview ~

THE POWER TO MAKE THE WORLD ROLL

02.

THE POWER TO MAKE THE WORLD ROLL

view details

DESIGN PROCESS

A DESIGN THAT FITS THE CITY'S AESTHETIC

The aging bicycle storage has been left unattended for years or months, so it can no longer be used for original storage purposes. Accordingly, the government has invested a lot of budget to carry out reorganization projects, but over time, it has no choice but to return to a neglected state.
Therefore, the bicycle battery relay station was created by combining energy recycling with a shared mobility business that everyone can own, not individual ownership.
~ Preview ~
A PLACE WHERE ONE'S MIND RESTS

DESIGN PROCESS

DESIGN WITH A WIDE RANGE OF CONSULTATIONS

The problem of suicide and depression among teenagers has been seriously reported and has been on the rise There are many such problems, but there are few places where counseling is possible except for school, and the reality is that counseling centers in schools cannot go comfortably.
For this reason, the government has opened and operated a counseling cafe, and accordingly, teenagers can come to have a cup of coffee and consult their feelings through letters in separate spaces other than schools
~ Preview ~

DESIGN PROCESS

WHEN THERE IS LIGHT, THERE IS A SHADOW

It explains the concept and development stage of the landing operation in the Korean War, the meaning of the landing operation, and establishes a memorial space to find out about Wolmido Island, which was damaged by the U.S. bombing during the Korean War, and to commemorate the innocent victims.
The exhibition hall is composed of high light and darkened U.S. military bombings and memorial spaces that created innocent victims, further deepening the exhibition hall.
12-2 Changyeong-dong, Dong-gu, Incheon, Republic of Korea
~ Preview ~
